snippet: Attorney General Pam Bondi, who was re-elected last week , has defended her decision to take free trips to conferences and socialize with lawyers for corporations under investigation by other states.
abstract: Florida Atty Gen Pam Bondi defends her decision to take free trips to conferences and socialize with lawyers for corporations under investigation by other states, saying she does not allow personal friendships to affect her objectivity.
lead_paragraph: Attorney General Pam Bondi, who was re-elected last week , has defended her decision to take free trips to conferences and socialize with lawyers for corporations under investigation by other states.

headline.main: Attorney General Pam Bondi of Florida Defends Free Trips
headline.print_headline: Florida: State’s Lawyer Defends Free Trips
